content.prompt: Which of the following is the best example of a president using technology to communicate and obtain public support for a public policy agenda?

choices.label: President Ronald Reagan reassuring the nation in a televised address after the Challenger disaster
President John F. Kennedy outlining Cold War challenges and urging Americans to civic action in his inaugural address
President Franklin D. Roosevelt addressing a joint session of Congress to seek a declaration of war after the attack on Pearl Harbor
President Richard Nixon claiming executive privilege to protect the recorded conversations he made in the White House

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply to different scenarios in context.
